snippet: Tennis moves into the semifinals, track and field gets underway with a star from Botswana beginning her quest for gold and Saudi Arabia's first woman athlete competes in judo. Jason Stallman has the latest from London.
abstract: Tennis moves into the semifinals, track and field gets underway with a star from Botswana beginning her quest for gold and Saudi Arabia's first woman athlete competes in judo. Jason Stallman has the latest from London.

headline.main: What We're Watching: A Day of Firsts and Faces
